title: What college should I opt for, MGM Indore or AIIMS Bhopal? - Quora
tags: All India Institute of Medical Sciences, Bhopal
All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS)

response.answer_text: Without a doubt, AIIMS Bhopal ! Better Infrastructure, better learning environment, better research exposure, better stipend during internship and absence of any post MBBS service bonds. These are few of the reasons for preferring AIIMS Bhopal over MGM Indore. Regards Dr Brajesh
